record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 27, 2007)

[Page: H11008]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to a famly health emergency, I was unable to be present for rollcall votes 891-923 on Monday, September 24 through Thursday, September 27, 2007. Had I been present, I would have voted in the following manner: "yea" on rollcall votes 891, 892, 893, 894, 895, 896, 897, 898, 899, 900, 901, 902, 903, 904, 905, 906, 907, 908, 909, 911, 913, 915, 916, 917, 918, 919, 921, and 923; "nay" on rollcall votes 910, 912, 914, 920, and 922.
